title: GAME DOESNT FEEL SMOOTH WITH HIGH FPS AND LOW MS BUT
body:
that is it , i have 60 fps or more and the internet is pretty good too, however since the last month the game have been weird, its like if the images were having problems charging.

 i doubt i have any virus since i dont download anything
 i update my nvidia drivers and windows updates
anybody have a clue?

replies.body: Kinda sounds like your network might be having some problems with packet loss if you never see any fluctuations in fps/ping but the game is still running pretty choppy or champs are sorta teleporting/moonwalking around. Try running a quick traceroute to the NA servers at 104.160.131.1 and posting the results here so I can take a look at how your connection is faring on it's way to our servers.

this is what come out 

C:\Users\MASTER>tracert  104.160.131.1

Trasar a  104.160.131.1 sobre caminos de 30 saltos como m√°ximo.

 12    74 ms    71 ms    75 ms  104.160.131.1

anyways i feel like this also happen when i am playing in somebody else internet:c
so more than five hundred people have seen this and nobody...
